title: Monoline Script
content:
Hello,  
Any idea what font is similar to this? I am working on a project where we are making dog tags and this is one of the fonts we can use in the stamping process.

Would like to get this font or something similar, perhaps even updated.

Thanks,  
Peter.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/monolineScript_3706.gif)

 [‹ Font used in a Book from Hermann Zapf (1954)](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34733 "Go to previous forum topic") [Microsoft Office 2003 programs formatting toolbar font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323/http:/www.typophile.com/node/34731 "Go to next forum topic")
author: markatos

comments.content:
Take a look at these fonts. Either of them is monoline and legible.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/veltro-pro/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/veltro-pro/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/veltro-pro/")

These are nice: [So Prolix](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323/http:/www.sudtipos.com/fonts/50), [P22 Cruz Ballpoint](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=IHT0000037), [Handsome Pro Thin](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=SHT0000037) or maybe one from [The Charles Bluemlein Script Collection](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323/http:/www.sudtipos.com/home) from Sudtipos?

[Alejandro Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128121323/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Alejandro%252BPaul) has a nice monoline script coming out soon, you might try contacting him to see if you can arrange something of a preview.
